entry.title: 解决iOS中双击页面上移切 fixed 元素异常的问题
entry.content: 12345678910111213141516171819(() => { let UA = window.navigator.userAgent; if(UA.toLowerCase().indexOf("ios") < 0) { return; } let lastTouch; window.addEventListener("touchend", (e) => { const now = Date.now(); if(lastTouch && (now - lastTouch) < 500) { e.preventDefault(); } lastTouch = now; }, false);})();
